name: 2018/10/05 Lunch
description: This delicious 2018/10/05 Lunch recipe, featuring Yakiniku (Beef Tips) and a host of fresh vegetables, is perfect for those looking for a high-fiber, healthy meal option. Infused with tantalizing sauces and spices, this dish not only nourishes your body but also tantalizes your taste buds, making it a standout addition to your collection of healthified recipes.
recipeIngredient: 1  tbsp(s) Seeds, sesame seeds, whole, dried
1  tsp ground (2.3 g), Black Pepper - Ground

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the red onion, mince the garlic, and chop the green capsicum and cabbage. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, marinate the Yakiniku (Beef Tips) with salt, black pepper, and 2 tablespoons of tomato purée. Let it sit for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a pan over medium heat and cook the marinated beef tips for 5 minutes, or until browned. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In the same pan, add a tablespoon of sesame oil and sauté the diced onion, minced garlic, and chopped capsicum for 5 minutes or until they are slightly softened.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the remaining tomato purée to the pan along with the chopped cabbage. Cook for another 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Return the cooked beef tips to the pan. Mix well to combine all the ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the mixture hot, garnished with sesame seeds and drizzled with mayonnaise.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
